alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 3:02AM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches with higher amounts of 4 to 8 inches over the higher elevations of the White Mountains. * WHERE...Areas near Winslow, Holbrook, Snowflake, St. Johns, Springerville, Heber, Happy Jack, Forest Lakes, Show Low, Greer, and Pinetop * WHEN...From 4 PM through 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; White Mountains
